## Project Summary

This is a React Flow Canvas application with the following features:
- Interactive flow diagram with custom nodes and edges
- TypeScript support for type safety
- ESLint for code quality
- Tailwind CSS for styling (configured)
- Vite for fast development and building

The application demonstrates various React Flow capabilities including:
- Custom node types (Annotation, Toolbar, Resizer, Circle, TextInput)
- Custom edge types (ButtonEdge with delete functionality)
- Interactive features (drag & drop, zoom, pan)
- MiniMap and Controls
- Background grid

Project is fully functional and ready for development.
